name: mediaxml
description: A module for working with media manifests represented by XML like ADI, mRSS, and SCTE236.

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:build:html && npm run docs:build:md
scripts.docs:build:md: documentation build index.js -a public -f md -g -o docs/api.md -c docs/md.yml  --markdown-toc-max-depth=4
scripts.docs:build:html: documentation build index.js -t node_modules/clean-documentation-theme -a public -f html -g -o docs -c docs/html.yml
scripts.docs:server: documentation serve -t node_modules/clean-documentation-theme -w index.js -a public -g -c docs/html.yml

author: Joseph Werle <joseph.werle@gmail.com>
